import React, {useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap"; const AddProduct = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); return (
<> Product Name setName(e.target.value)} /> Product Description setDescription(e.target.value)} /> Price setPrice(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default AddProduct;
